sense.name: electronic device
sense.commentary: A device used for performing calculations and playing games.
sense.examples: John's high-tech computer came equipped with a floppy disk drive. I dropped my computer while carrying it up the stairs. He majored in computer science. Your computer is probably filled with illegal software. Computer technology will revolutionize the way we do business.

sense.name: person who computes
sense.commentary: A person who performs calculations or computations. This is a very rare usage.
sense.examples: John has been the computer of my taxes for fifty years.
